title: Pea Ridge National Military Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Park Grounds (This includes the tour road and all trails)Year Round - 6:00am - DuskVisitor Center 8:30 AM to 4:30 PM (open 7 days a week)Visitor Center CLOSED Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day, New Years Day and for emergencies/severe weather.   All visitor services and operating hours of both the battlefield and the visitor center are subject to change without notice. For further information, please call the park at 479-451-8122, ext. 227.
